officialTitle: Study of the Efficacy, Safety, and Immunogenicity of V260 at Expiry

interventions.name: RotaTeq™, rotavirus vaccine, live, oral, pentavalent

arms.label: RotaTeq™ at Expiry Potency (≈1.1 x 10^7 IU/Dose)

summary: This study was designed to evaluate the safety of the investigational Rotavirus Vaccine and the efficacy to prevent Rotavirus Gastroenteritis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Occurence of Clinical Rotavirus Disease Caused by the Composite of the Serotypes Contained Within the Vaccine More Than 14 Days Following the Third Dose.
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: At least 14 days following the 3rd vaccination

effectByArm.arm: RotaTeq™ at Expiry Potency (≈1.1 x 107 IU/Dose)
